SA11bsa047_u:17_2: tayā hi samyagupāyaṃ vivicyāviparyasto yathāvat svaparārthānuṣṭhānād viṣamiva mantraparigṛhītaṃ bhuñjāno na saṃkliśyate /

SA11bsa047_u:76_10: tatra sthitasya yoginaḥ sarvavikalpānām astaṃgamāt samyak kleśāvaraṇaṃ jñeyāvaraṇaṃ ca prahīyate /

SA11bsa047_u:76_15: kleśā vinayaṃ gacchanti, kathaṃ kleśāḥ parijñātā bhavanti? mañjuśrīrāha- paramārthato 'tyantājātānutpannābhāveṣu sarvadharmeṣu saṃvṛtyāsadviparyāsaḥ /

SA11bsa047_u:77_1: tatprahāṇe sakalaviparyāsaprahāṇād jñeyāvaraṇam apyanena samyak prahīyate,
SA11bsa047_u:77_3: jñeyāvaraṇe ca prahīṇe pratibandhābhāvād ravikiraṇavad apagatameghādyāvaraṇe nabhasi sarvatrāvyāhato yogi pratyakṣo jñānālokaḥ pravartate /
SA11bsa047_u:77_5: tacca saṃnihitam api vastu pratibandhasadbhāvānna prakāśayati /
SA11bsa047_u:77_6: pratibandhābhāve tu sati, acintyaśaktiviśeṣalābhāt kimiti sakalam eva vastu yathāvad na prakāśayet /
SA11bsa047_u:77_7: ataḥ saṃvṛtiparamārtharūpeṇa sakalasya vastuno yathāvat parijñānāt sarvajñatvam avāpyate /
SA11bsa047_u:77_8: ato 'yam evāvaraṇaprahāṇo sarvajñatvādhigame ca paramo mārgaḥ /
SA11bsa047_u:78_0: yastu śrāvakādīnāṃ mārgastena viparyāsāprahāṇān na samyag āvaraṇadvayaṃ prahīyate /
SA11bsa047_u:78_1: tathā coktam āryalaṅkāvatāre- “anye tu kāraṇādhīnān sarvadharmān dṛṣṭvānirvāṇe 'pi nirvāṇam iti buddhayo bhavanti /
SA11bsa047_u:78_4: atra mahāmate, [Bhk_191] kudṛṣṭivyāvartanā yogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ” iti /
SA11bsa047_u:78_5: ata eva cānyena mārgeṇa mokṣābhāvād ekam eva yānam uktaṃ bhagavatā /
SA11bsa047_u:79_2: na tvātmāstīti bhāvayan śrāvakaḥ pudgalanairātmyam avatarati,
SA11bsa047_u:79_6: yathoktaṃ prāk / uktaṃ ca āryalokottaraparivarte “punaraparaṃ bho jinaputra! cittamātraṃ traidhātukam avatarati,
SA11bsa047_u:80_0: sā ceyaṃ yoginām avasthā kuto viśodhitā? ityāha-
SA11bsa047_u:81_0: “praṇidhānairviśodhitā” iti / mahākaruṇayā yat sarvasattvārthakaraṇāya bodhisattvena praṇihitam,
SA11bsa047_u:81_1: tataḥ praṇidhānabalād uttarottaradānādikuśalābhyāsāt sā tathā viśuddhā jāta,
SA11bsa047_u:81_2: yena sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvatājñāne 'pi sakalasattvāpekṣā na vyāvartate yāvat saṃsāra eva ananuliptāḥ saṃsāradoṣairavatiṣṭhanta iti /
SA11bsa047_u:82_0: jñānaṃ nirātmakaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ nirābhāsena paśyati / iti /
SA11bsa047_u:83_0: yasmād yad advayalakṣaṇaṃ jñānam advayavādināṃ śreṣṭhaṃ paramārthenābhimataṃ tadapi nirātmakaṃ niḥsvabhāvam advayanirābhāsena jñānena paśyati yogī /
SA11bsa047_u:84_2: yaḥ paśyatīti cet? na paramārthataḥ kaścid ātmādiḥ svatantro 'sti,
SA11bsa047_u:84_3_0: yogī nāpi kaścit paśyati / kintu saṃvṛtyā yathā rūpādīviṣayākārajñānotpādamātreṇa vijñānameva loke tathā tathā vyavahriyate
SA11bsa047_u:84_3_1: devadatto yajñadattaṃ jñānena paśyatīti na tu kaścid ātmādirasti /
SA11bsa047_u:84_4: tathātrāpi jñānamevādvayajñānanirābhāsam utpadyamānaṃ tathā vyapadiśyate nirābhāsena jñānena paśyatiti /
SA11bsa047_u:84_5: na hi sarvadharmāṇāṃ paramārthato niḥsvabhāvatve 'pi saṃvṛtyā yogijñānam anyad vā pṛthagjñānaṃ neṣṭam /
SA11bsa047_u:84_6: tathā coktam āryasatyadvayanirdeśe- “paramārthato 'tyantābhāvaśca saṃvṛttyā ca mārga bhāvayati” iti /
SA11bsa047_u:85_1: kintu yasya saṃvṛtyāpi kāraṇaṃ nāsti sa saṃvṛtyāpi notpadyate /
SA11bsa047_u:85_2: yathā śaśaviṣāṇādi / yasya tu [kāraṇaṃ] vidyate sa paramārthato 'līko 'pi samutpadyata eva /
SA11bsa047_u:85_4: na ca māyādeḥ saṃvṛtyā pratītyasamutpāde paramārthato vastutvaprasaṅgaḥ,
SA11bsa047_u:85_5: tasya vicārākṣamatvāt / ataḥ sarvameva māyopamaṃ jagat /
SA11bsa047_u:85_6: tatra yathā kleśakarmamāyāvaśāt sattvānāṃ janmamāyā pravarteta,
SA11bsa047_u:85_7: tathā yogināmapi puṇyajñānasambhāramāyāvaśād yogijñānamāyā pravartata eva /
SA11bsa047_u:85_10: kaścid bodhisattvanirmitaḥ, kaścit tathāgatanirmitaḥ, kaścit kleśanirmitaḥ kaścit karmanirmitaḥ /
SA11bsa047_u:85_11: anena subhūte, paryāyeṇa sarvadharmā nirmitotpannāḥ” iti /
SA11bsa047_u:85_13: te hi māyākāravat tāṃ māyāṃ yathāvat parijñānāt satyato nābhiniviśante,
SA11bsa047_u:85_15: ye tāṃ bālapṛthagjanavat kautūhalaṃ styatvenābhiniviṣṭāste viparītābhiniveśad bāla ucyante iti sarvamaviruddham /
SA11bsa047_u:86_1: na cāsya nirmite saṅgo jñātapūrvo yato 'sya saḥ //
SA11bsa047_u:88_0: tatra ca layauddhatyādīn vyutthitān pūrvavat praśamayet /
SA11bsa047_u:88_1: yadā tu sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvatālambane ca layauddhatyādirahitam anabhisaṃskāreṇa pravṛttaṃ jñānaṃ bhavati,
SA11bsa047_u:88_3: tathā yāvat śaknoti tāvad adhimuktibalena adhimukticaryābhūmau sthito bhāvayet /
SA11bsa047_u:89_0: tato yathecchaṃ paryaṅkamābhujya vyutthāya punarevaṃ cintayet /
SA11bsa047_u:89_1: yadi nāmāmī dharmāḥ paramārthata eva niḥsvabhāvā apyete saṃvṛtyā sthitā eva /
SA11bsa047_u:89_2: tathā coktam āryaratnameghe- “kathaṃ bodhisattvo nairātmyakuśalo bhavati? iha kulaputra,
SA11bsa047_u:89_6: virodhaṃ nopalabhate, samudayaṃ nopalabhate / evaṃ vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇāṃ vijñānasyotpādaṃ nopalabhate,
SA11bsa047_u:89_7: nirodhaṃ nopalabhate, samudayaṃ nopalabhate / ayaṃ ca paramārthato 'nutpādavihāriṇyāḥ prajñāyā na punarvyāvahārikeṇa svabhāvena” iti vistaraḥ /
SA11bsa047_u:89_8: ete ca bālabuddhaya evaṃ niḥsvabhāveṣu bhāveṣu [Bhk_194] viparītābhiniveśāt saṃsāre paribhramanto vividhāni duḥkhāni pratyanubhavanti /
SA11bsa047_u:89_9: mahākaruṇām eva āmukhīkṛtya evamanuvicintayet- tathāhaṃ kariṣyāmi yathā sarvajñatvaṃ prāpya eteṣāṃ dharmatāmavabodhayeyamiti /
SA11bsa047_u:90_2: tathā coktam āryadharmasaṃgītau- “yathābhūtadarśino bodhisattvasya sattveṣu mahākaruṇā pravartate /
SA11bsa047_u:90_3: evaṃ cāsya bhavati- idaṃ mayā samādhimukhaṃ sarvadharmayathābhūtadarśaṃ ca sarvasattvānāṃ nispādayitavyam /
SA11bsa047_u:90_4: sa tayā mahākaruṇayā saṃcodyamāno 'dhiśīlam adhicittam adhiprajñaṃ ca śikṣātrayaṃ paripūryānuttaraṃ samyaksambodhim abhisambudhyate” iti /
SA11bsa047_u:91_0: ayameva prajñopāyayuganaddhabāhī bodhisattvānāṃ mārgo yat paramārthadarśane 'pi saṃvṛtiṃ nocchedayanti /
SA11bsa047_u:91_1: saṃvṛtiṃ cānucchedayanto mahākaruṇāpūrvaṅgamā aviparyastā eva sattvārthakriyāsu pravartante /
SA11bsa047_u:91_4: śikṣāmārgaṃ ca nopalabhate / yacca śikṣate tadapi nopalabhate /
SA11bsa047_u:91_6: na ca taddhetukaṃ tannidānaṃ tatpratyayam ucchedadṛṣṭau patati” iti /
SA11bsa047_u:91_7: āryadharmasaṃgītau coktam- “katamā bodhisattvānāṃ pratipattiḥ? yat kiñcid bodhisattvānāṃ kāyakarma,
SA11bsa047_u:91_8: yat kiñcid vākkarma, yat kiñcin manaḥkarma, tat sarvasattvāpekṣakaṃ pravartate,
SA11bsa047_u:91_11: sā mayā [Bhk_195] pratipattiḥ pratipattavyā sarvasattvānāṃ hitāvahā sukhāvahā /
SA11bsa047_u:91_12: tasya skandheṣu māyāvat pratyavekṣaṇā pratipattirna ca skandhaparityāgaṃ spṛhayatīti /
SA11bsa047_u:91_13: dhātuṣvāśīviṣavat pratyavekṣaṇā pratipattirna ca dhātuparityāgaṃ spṛhayatīti /
SA11bsa047_u:91_15: rūpasya phenapiṇḍavat pratyavekṣaṇā pratipattirna ca tathāgatarūpakāyaviṭhapanāṃ jahāti /
SA11bsa047_u:91_16: vedanāyā budbudvat pratyavekṣaṇā pratipattirna ca tathāgatadhyānasamādhisamāpattisukhaniṣpadanaprayogaṃ nārabhate /
SA11bsa047_u:91_17: saṃjñāyāṃ marīcivat pratyavekṣaṇā pratipattirna ca tathāgatajñānaniṣpādana apratipattiḥ /
SA11bsa047_u:91_18: saṃskārāṇāṃ kadalīvat pratyavekṣaṇā pratipattirna ca buddhadharmasaṃskārāṇām apratipattiḥ /
SA11bsa047_u:91_19: vijñānasya māyāvat pratyavekṣaṇā pratipattirna ca jñānapūrvaṅgamakāyavāṅmanaskarmaniṣpādanā pratipattiḥ” iti vistaraḥ /
SA11bsa047_u:92_0: tatra yadi nāma lokottaraprajñāvasthāyām upāyasevanā na sambhavati,
SA11bsa047_u:92_1: upāyasevanākāle tu bodhisattvasya māyākāravad aviparyastatvāt lokottarajñānāt prayogapṛṣṭhabhāvani yathāvad vastuparamārthatattvābhiniveśanī prajñāsambhavatyeveti,
SA11bsa047_u:92_4: evamanena krameṇa bodhisattvasya prajñām upāyaṃ ca satataṃ satkṛtya dīrghakālābhyāsena bhāvayato dvādaśāvasthāviśeṣā bhavanti /
SA11bsa047_u:93_1: kevalaṃ dṛḍhatarādhimuktiḥ / mārādibhirapyabhedyo yadādhimuktibalena tattvaṃ bhavayati,
SA11bsa047_u:93_3: asyāmapi bhūmau vartamāno bodhisattva pṛthagjano 'pi sarvabālavipattisamatikrānto 'saṃkhyeyasamādhidhāraṇīvimokṣābhijñādiguṇānvita āryaratnameghe paṭhyate /
SA11bsa047_u:94_0: asyā eva ca mṛdumadhyādhimātrādhimātratarāvasthācatuṣṭayena catvāri nirvedhabhāgīyāni vyavasthāpyante /
SA11bsa047_u:94_1: tathā hi yadā [bāhyārtha vibhāvayatā] īṣatspaṣṭo jñānāloko bhavati tadā uṣmagatanāmakaṃ nirvedhabhāgīyaṃ bhavati /
SA11bsa047_u:94_3: yadā tu sa eva jñānaloko madhyamaspaṣṭo bhavati,
SA11bsa047_u:94_10: yadā tu grāhyagrāhakākārarahitam advayaṃ jñānaṃ vibhāvayet tadāgradharmākhyaṃ nirvedhabhāgīyaṃ bhavati /
SA11bsa047_u:95_2: tathā hi yadāgradharmānantaraṃ prathamataraṃ lokottaraṃ sarvaprapañcarahitaṃ sarvadharmaniḥsvabhāvatāsākṣātkāri sphuṭataraṃ jñānam utpadyate,
SA11bsa047_u:95_3: tadā bodhisattvaḥ samyaktvanyayābhāvakrāntito darśanamārgotpādāt prathamāṃ bhūmiṃ praviṣṭo bhavati /
SA11bsa047_u:95_4: ata evāsyāṃ bhūmau prathamato 'nadhigatatattvādhigamād bodhisattvaḥ pramudito bhavati /
SA11bsa047_u:95_6: atra ca dvādaśottaraṃ darśanaheyaṃ kleśaśataṃ prahīyate /
SA11bsa047_u:96_3: asyāṃ ca bhūmau bodhisattvasya dharmadhātusamudāgamatāprabodhāt svārtha iva parāthe pravartanād dānapāramitātiriktatarā bhavati /
SA11bsa047_u:96_4: sa ca bodhisattvaḥ samadhigatatattvo 'pi vā yāvann śaknoti sūkṣmāpattiskhaliteṣu samprajanyavihāri bhavituṃ tāvat prathamā bhūmiḥ /
SA11bsa047_u:96_5: yadā tu śaknoti, tadāsyāṅgasya paripūrito dvitīyā bhūmirvyavasthāpyate /
SA11bsa047_u:96_6: ata evāsyāṃ bhūmau sūkṣmāpattiskhalitasamudācārāt śīlapāramitātiriktatarā bhavati /
SA11bsa047_u:97_1: yāvanna śaknoti sakalalaukikaṃ samādhiṃ samāpattuṃ yathāśrutaṃ cārtham ādharttuṃ tāvad dvitīyaiva bhūmiḥ /
SA11bsa047_u:97_2: yadā śaknoti, tadā tasyāṅgasya paripūritastṛtīyā bhūmirvyavasthāpyate /
SA11bsa047_u:97_3: asyāṃ ca bhūmau bodhisattvasya śrutadhāraṇyā sarvalaukikasamādhyābhinirhārārthaṃ sarvaduḥkhasahanāt,
SA11bsa047_u:97_5: teṣāṃ samādhīnāṃ lābhād iya bhūmirapramāṇaṃ lokottaraṃ jñānāvabhāsaṃ karotīti prabhākarītyucyate /
SA11bsa047_u:98_0: sa pratilabdhalaukikasakalasamādhirapi yāvann śaknoti yathāpratilabdhairbodhipakṣairdharmairbahulaṃ vihartuṃ sarvasamāpattīnāṃ ca cittam upekṣituṃ tāvat tṛtīyā bhūmiḥ /
SA11bsa047_u:98_1: yadā tu śaknoti tadā tasyāṅgasya paripūritaścaturthī bhūmirvyavasthāpyate /
SA11bsa047_u:98_4: iyaṃ ca sakalakleśendhanadāhasamarthasya bodhipakṣadharmārciṣa udgatatvād arciṣmatītyucyate /
SA11bsa047_u:99_1: yāvanna śaknoti satyāni bhāvayan saṃsārānabhimukhaṃ nirvāṇābhimukhaṃ ca ceto vyāvartayitum upāyasaṃgṛhītān [Bhk_198] bodhipakṣān dharmān bhāvayitum,
SA11bsa047_u:99_2: tāvaccaturthī bhūmiḥ / yadā tu śaknoti tadāsyāṅgasya paripūritaḥ pañcamī bhūmirvyavasthāpyate /
SA11bsa047_u:99_3: ata evāsyām iyam upāyasaṃgṛhītā bodhipakṣabhāvanā [paripūritena] suṣṭhu duḥkhena jīyate abhyasyatā iti sudurjayetyujyate /
SA11bsa047_u:100_2: yāvad na śaknoti saṃsārapravṛttipratyavekṣaṇān nirvitsahayā cittasantatyānimittavihāraṃ samāpattuṃ tāvat pañcamī bhūmiḥ /
SA11bsa047_u:100_3: yadā śaknoti tadāsyāṅgasya paripūritaḥ ṣaṣṭhī bhūmirvyavasthāpyate /
SA11bsa047_u:100_4: asyāṃ ca bodhisattvasya pratītyasamutpādabhāvanāvihārāt prajñāpāramitātiriktatarā bhavati /
SA11bsa047_u:100_5: ata eva prajñāpāramitāyā atiriktataratvāt sarvabuddhadharmeṣu abhimukho 'syāṃ bhūmau vartata iti kṛtvā abhimukhītyucyate /
SA11bsa047_u:101_2: tāvat ṣaṣṭhī bhūmiḥ / yadā śaknoti tadāsyāṅgasya paripūritaḥ saptamī bhūmirvyavasthāpyate /
SA11bsa047_u:101_3: asyāmapi bhūmau bodhisattvaḥ sarvanimittaṃ nirnimittena pratividhyati nimittakṛtavyavahāraṃ ca na virodhayati /
SA11bsa047_u:101_5: iyaṃ ca bhūmiranābhogamārgopaśleṣāt suṣṭhu dūraṅgamād dūraṅgamā /
SA11bsa047_u:102_1: yāvanna śaknotyanābhogavāhinam animittavihāraṃ samāpattuṃ tāvat saptamī bhūmiḥ /
SA11bsa047_u:102_3: asyāṃ ca bhūmau anābhogena kuśalapakṣayogāt praṇidhānapāramitātiriktatarā bhavati /
SA11bsa047_u:103_2: yāvanna śaknoti paryāyaniruktyādiprabhedaiḥ sarvākārasarvadharmadeśanāyāṃ vaśībhavituṃ tāvad aṣṭamī bhūmiḥ /
SA11bsa047_u:103_3: yadā śaknoti tadāsyāṅgasya paripūrito navamī bhūmirvyavasthāpyate /
SA11bsa047_u:103_4: asyāṃ ca bhūmau bodhisattvasya pratisaṃvid- viśeṣalābhāt prajñābalaviśeṣayogād balapāramitātiriktatarā bhavati /
SA11bsa047_u:104_1: yāvanna śaknoti buddhakṣetraparṣannirmāṇādi darśayituṃ paripūrṇadharmasambhogaṃ sattvaparipākaṃ ca kartum,
SA11bsa047_u:104_2: tāvad navamī bhūmiḥ / yadā tu śaknoti tadāsyāṅgasya paripūrito daśamī bhūmirvyavasthāpyate /
SA11bsa047_u:104_3: asyāṃ ca nirmāṇādinā sattvaparipācanāya jñānaviśeṣayogād bodhisattvasya jñānapāramitātiriktatarā bhavati /
SA11bsa047_u:104_4: iyaṃ ca dharmadeśanāmeghaiḥ ananteṣu lokadhātuṣu dharmapravarṣaṇād dharmameghetyucyate /
SA11bsa047_u:105_0: sa pratilabdha- nirmāṇādivaśito 'pi yāvan na śaknoti sarvasmin jñeye sarvākāram asaktam /
SA11bsa047_u:105_1: apratihataṃ jñānam utpādayituṃ tāvad daśamī bhūmi /
SA11bsa047_u:105_4: asyāśca buddhabhūmeḥ sarvākārasakalasaṃpatprakarṣḍaparyantagamanānnāparam utkṛṣṭaṃ sthānāntaramasti [tasmāt tataḥ paraṃ nāsti bhūmivyavasthā] iti /
SA11bsa047_u:106_0: asyāśca buddhamūmerguṇapakṣaprabhedo buddhairapi na śakyate sarvākāraṃ vaktum /
SA11bsa047_u:108_2: aśeṣadoṣāpagamaniṣṭhāṃ prāpya bhagavān buddho dharmakāye sthitvā sambhoganirmāṇakāyābhyām anābhogarūpeṇa aśeṣajagadartha kurvan yāvat saṃsāraṃ viharati /
SA11bsa047_u:109_0: tasmāt prekṣavadbhiḥ sarvaguṇākareṣu bhagavatsu śraddhā utpadanīyā,
SA11bsa047_u:110_0: nayasyānusāreṇa sūtrasya cāṭha saduktyāsya mārgasya jinaputrakāṇām /
SA11bsa047_u:110_1: mayānalpapuṇyaṃ yadāptaṃ ca tena parāmetu buddhiṃ jaganmandamāśu //
SA11bsa047_u:111_0: bhūpatiśrīdevarājavacanena] kamalaśīlena bhāvanākramasya ayaṃ saṃkṣepaḥ kṛtaḥ /
SA11bsa047_u:115_1: iha atīśighraṃ sarvajñatāprāptukāmena prekṣāvatā tatprāpaka-hetu-pratyayebhyo 'bhiyogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ /
SA11bsa047_u:116_0: itthamiyaṃ sarvajñatā tu hetuṃ vinā bhavituṃ na yujyate,
SA11bsa047_u:116_2: nirapekṣabhāve tu kutrāpi pratigho na syād,
SA11bsa047_u:116_3: yato hi sarve 'pi sarvajñā eva na bhavanti /
SA11bsa047_u:116_4: kiṃ tarhi kasyacit kadācit kiñcinmātraṃmūtatvāt sarvaṃ hi vastu hetusāpekṣameva /
SA11bsa047_u:116_6: sarvasminnapi kāle nāsti, sarvasmin sthāne nāsti, sarvamapi nāsti, tasmāt sā tu niyatameva hetupratyayasāpekṣā /
SA11bsa047_u:116_9: yathā-śṛṅgāt payodohavat / sakalahetusevanaṃ vināpi na phalotpādaḥ /
SA11bsa047_u:117_2: tathāpi bhagavataivābhisaṃbuddhaya vineyajanebhyo yathoktaṃ tathaiva mayā bhagavadvacanenaiva kathyate /

SA11bsa047_u:193_9: tadā vastuparyantatāvagamāt prathamāyāṃ bhūmau vastuparyantatālambanam ucyate /
SA11bsa047_u:193_10: tato bhāvanāmārgeṇa pariśiṣṭāsu bhūmiṣvoṣadhirasāyanopayogād iva krameṇa viśuddhataratamakṣaṇodayād āśrayaparāvṛttau satyām,
SA11bsa047_u:193_11: āvaraṇa-prahāṇalakṣaṇa-kāryaparisamāptiryadā bhavati tadā buddhabhūmau tad eva jñānaṃ kāryapariniṣpattyālambanam ucyate /
SA11bsa047_u:194_0: tad evam anena kiṃ darśitaṃ bhavati? śamathavipaśyanābhyāṃ samastavastuparyantatādhigamo bhavati /
SA11bsa047_u:194_2: tad eva ca buddhatvam / ato buddhatvādhigamārthinā śamathavipaśyane sevanīye /
SA11bsa047_u:194_3: yastu te na sevate tasya naiva vastuparyantatādhigamo nāpi kāryapariniṣpattiriti /
SA11bsa047_u:194_5: vipaśyanā bhūtapratyavekṣeti saṃkṣepād āryaratnameghādau bhagavatā śamathavipaśyanayorlakṣaṇam uktam /
SA11bsa047_u:194_6: tatra yoginā śīlaviśuddhayādau śamathavipaśyanāsaṃbhāre sthitena sarvasattveṣu mahākaruṇām utpādya,
SA11bsa047_u:195_0_0: tatra prathamaṃ tāvad yogī bhāvanā-kāle sarvam itikaraṇiyaṃ parisamāpya kṛtamūtrapurīṣaḥ kaṇṭaka-svarādirahite mano 'nukūle
SA11bsa047_u:195_0_1: pradeśe sthitvā mayā sarvasattvā bodhimaṇḍe niṣpādayitavyā iti viniścayan,
SA11bsa047_u:195_2_0: daśadigavasthitān sarvabuddhabodhisattvān pañcāṅgena praṇipatyāgrato buddhabodhisattvān pīṭhādau sthāpayitvā anyatra vā yathāvat
SA11bsa047_u:195_2_1: tebhyaśca yathāruci pūjāstavanaṃ kṛtvā svapāpaṃ pradeśya,
SA11bsa047_u:195_4: mṛdutarasukhāsane vairocanabhaṭṭārakabaddhaparyaṅkeṇa [Bhk_225] ardhaparyeṅkeṇa vā niṣadya nātyunmīlite nātinimīlite nāsikāgravinyaste cakṣuṣī kṛtvā,
SA11bsa047_u:195_7: śiro nonnataṃ nāvanatam ekapārśve niścalaṃ sthāpayitavyam /
SA11bsa047_u:195_11: āśvāsapraśvāsāstu na saśabdā nāpi śthūlā nāpi tvaritāḥ karaṇīyāḥ /
SA11bsa047_u:195_12: kiṃ tvasaṃlakṣayamāṇāṃ mandaṃ mandamanābhogena yathā praviśeyurnirgaccheyurvā tathā karaṇiyam /
SA11bsa047_u:196_0: tatra prathamaṃ tāvad yogī yathādṛṣṭaśrute tathāgatavigrahe cittaṃ sthāpayitvā śamathaṃ niṣpādayet /
SA11bsa047_u:196_1_0: tañca tathāgatavigraham uttaptakanakāvadātaṃ lakṣaṇānuvyañjanālaṃkṛtaṃ parṣanmaṇḍalamadhyagataṃ nānāvidhairupāyaiḥ sattvārthaṃ
SA11bsa047_u:196_1_1: kurvantaṃ prābandhikena manasikāreṇa tadguṇābhilāṣaṃ samupādāya layauddhatyādīn vyupaśamayya tāvad dhyāyed yāvat sphuṭataraṃ
SA11bsa047_u:196_2: tataḥ tasya tathāgatavigrahapratibimbakasyāgatigatiṃ nirūpayato vipaśyanāṃ bhāvayati /
SA11bsa047_u:196_4_0: yathedaṃ tathāgatavigrahapratibimbakaṃ na kutaścid āgataṃ nāpi kvacid gamiṣyati tiṣṭhadapi svabhāvaśūnyam ātmātmīyarahitaṃ
SA11bsa047_u:196_4_1: tathā eva sarvadharmāḥ svabhāvaśūnyā āgatigatirahitāḥ pratibimbopamāḥ,
SA11bsa047_u:196_5: bhāvādirūparahitā iti vicāryoparatavicāreṇa nirjalpaikarase manasā tattvaṃ bhāvayan yāvadicchaṃ tiṣṭhet /
SA11bsa047_u:197_1: tatra cittam upanibadhya layauddhatyādipraśamena śamathaṃ niṣpādayet /
SA11bsa047_u:197_5: tatra bālā bhāvādigrahābhiniveśād viparyastadhiyaḥ saṃsāre paribhramanti /
SA11bsa047_u:197_6: teṣāṃ viparyāsāpanayanāya, teṣu ca mahākaruṇām āmukhīkṛtya,
SA11bsa047_u:197_7: niṣpannaśamatho yogī tattvādhigamāya tato vipaśyanāṃ bhāvayet /
SA11bsa047_u:198_2: tatraivaṃ yogī nirūpayet / na tāvad rūpādivyatiriktaḥ pudgalo 'sti /
SA11bsa047_u:198_9: tasmād alīkavibhrama evāyaṃ lokasya yadutāhaṃ mameti niścayaṃ pratipannasya /
SA11bsa047_u:198_10_0: tato rūpiṇo 'pi dharmān dharmanairātmyādhigamāya vicārayet- kim ete cittavyatirekeṇa paramārthasantaḥ sthitāḥ āhosviccittameva
SA11bsa047_u:198_11: sa tān paramāṇuśo nirūpayan, paramāṇūṃśca bhāgaśaḥ pratyavekṣamāṇo nopalabhate /
SA11bsa047_u:199_0: cittamātrañca traidhātukam avatarati nānyathā / atha coktaṃ laṅkāvatāre-
SA11bsa047_u:200_0: aṇuśo vibhajati dravyaṃ na caiva rūpaṃ vikalpayet /
SA11bsa047_u:201_1: tasyaivaṃ bhavati cittamevānādikālikavitatharūpādyabhiniveśavaśāt svapnopalabhyamānarūpādipratibhāsavad bālānāṃ bahiḥ vicchinnamiva rūpādipratibhāsaṃ khyāti /
SA11bsa047_u:201_3: sa evaṃ cittameva sakaladharmaprajñaptiṃ niścitya tatra pratyavekṣya ca sarvadharmāṇāṃ svabhāvaḥ pratyavekṣito bhavatīti cittasvabhāvamapi pratyavekṣate /
SA11bsa047_u:201_4: sa evaṃ vicārayati, cittamapi paramārthato māyāvad anutpannam /
SA11bsa047_u:201_5: yada hi alīkasvabhāvarūpādyākāropagraheṇa cittameva citrākāraṃ pratibhāsate,
SA11bsa047_u:201_6: tadāsyāpi rūpādivat tadavyatirekāt satyatvaṃ kutra bhavet? yathā citrākāratayā rūpādayo naikānekasvabhāvāstathā cittamapi tadavyatirekeṇa naikānekasvabhāvam /
SA11bsa047_u:201_10: tasmān māyopamameva cittam / yathā cittamevaṃ sarvadharmā māyāvat paramārthato 'nutpannāḥ /
SA11bsa047_u:202_0: yenāpi cittena pratyavekṣate yogī tasyāpi svabhāvaṃ parīkṣamāṇo nopalabhate /
SA11bsa047_u:202_1_0: tad evaṃ yatra yatrālambane yoginaścittaṃ prasaret tasya tasya svabhāvaṃ parīkṣamāṇo [tat svabhāvamapi nopalabhate] 'sau
SA11bsa047_u:202_1_1: yada nopalabhate tadā sarvameva vastu vicārya kadalīskandhavad asāramavagamya,
SA11bsa047_u:202_2: tataścittaṃ vivartayati / tato bhāvādivikalpoparatau sarvaprapañcavigatam ānimittaṃ yogaṃ pratilabhate /
SA11bsa047_u:202_3: tathā coktam āryaratnameghe- “sa evam apakṣālakuśalaḥ sarvaprapañcavigamāya śūnyatābhāvanāyā yogamāpadyate /
SA11bsa047_u:202_4_0: sa śūnyatābhāvanābahulo yeṣu yeṣu sthāneṣu cittaṃ prasarati cittamabhiramate tāni tāni sthānāni svabhāvataḥ [Bhk_228] parigaveṣamāṇaḥ
SA11bsa047_u:202_4_1: śūnyaṃ pratividhyati [yat cittaṃ tadapi parīkṣamāṇaṃ śūnyaṃ pratividhyati] yenāpi cittena parīkṣate tad api svabhāvataḥ parigaveṣyamāṇaṃ
SA11bsa047_u:202_7: yastu nopaparīkṣate tasya nāsti nirnimittatāyāṃ praveśa iti /
SA11bsa047_u:203_0: sa evaṃ dharmāṇāṃ svabhāvamupaparīkṣamāṇo yada nopalabhate,
SA11bsa047_u:203_1: tadāstīti na vikalpayati nāstīti na vikalpayati /
SA11bsa047_u:203_2: yo 'sau nāstīti kalpyate tasya buddhau sarvadaivāpratibhāsanāt /
SA11bsa047_u:203_3: yadi hi bhāvaḥ kadācid dṛṣṭo bhavet,
SA11bsa047_u:203_5: yadā kālatraye 'pi yoginā prajñayā nirūpayatā bhāvo nopalabdhaḥ tadā kasya pratiṣedhān nāstīti kalpayet /
SA11bsa047_u:203_6: evamanye vikalpāstasya tadānīṃ na santi eva,
SA11bsa047_u:203_10: rūpādiṣu cāniśrito bhavati / prajñayā ca nirūpayataḥ sakalavastusvabhāvānupalambhāt prajñottaradhyāyī bhavati /
SA11bsa047_u:203_14: anabhisaṃskārataḥ tad eva tattvaṃ sphuṭataram avadhārayan yogī tiṣṭheta /
SA11bsa047_u:204_0: yadāntarā cittaṃ bahirdhā vikṣiptaṃ paśyet tadā tatsvabhāvapratyevekṣaṇena vikṣepaṃ praśamayya,
SA11bsa047_u:204_5: atha styānamiddhābhibhavād yada pracāratayā līnaṃ cittaṃ paśyet,
SA11bsa047_u:204_6: layābhiśaṅkitaṃ vā tadā pramodyavastu buddharūpādikamālokasaṃjñāṃ vā manasikṛtya layamupaśamayet,
SA11bsa047_u:204_8: yadā tu jātyandhavad andhakārapraviṣṭapuruṣavad vinimīlitākṣavat sphuṭataraṃ tattvaṃ nāvadhārayed yogī,
SA11bsa047_u:204_9: tadā tasya līnaṃ cittaṃ veditavyaṃ vipaśyanārahitaṃ ca /
SA11bsa047_u:204_10: atha yathā pūrvānubhūtaviṣayaspṛhayā cittamantarā samuddhataṃ paśyed,
SA11bsa047_u:204_11: auddhatyābhiśaṅkitaṃ vā, tadānityatādi saṃvegavastumanasikārād auddhatyaṃ śamayet /
SA11bsa047_u:204_12: tataḥ punaḥ tatraiva tattve cittānabhisaṃskāravāhitāyāṃ yatnaṃ kurvīta /
SA11bsa047_u:204_13: yadā ca vikṣiptapuruṣavad vānaravad vānavasthitavṛtti cittaṃ bhavet,
SA11bsa047_u:204_15: atha yadā layauddhatyābhyāṃ viviktatayā samapravṛttaṃ svarasavāhi sphuṭataraṃ tatraiva tattve cittam utpādyate tadābhogaśithilīkaraṇād upekṣaṇiyam /
SA11bsa047_u:205_0: yadā ca vipaśyanā bhāvayet prajñātiriktatarā bhāvayet,
SA11bsa047_u:205_1: tadā śamathasyālpatvāt pravātasthitapradipavat pracalatvāccittasya na sphuṭataraṃ tattvadarśanaṃ bhavet /
SA11bsa047_u:205_3: śamathasyābhyādhikye middhāvaṣṭabadhapuruṣasyeva sphuṭataraṃ tattvadarśanaṃ na syāt /
SA11bsa047_u:205_5: yadā samapravṛtte dve api bhavato yuganaddhavāhibalīvardadvayavat tadānabhisaṃskāreṇaiva tāvat sthātavyaṃ yāvat kāyacittapīḍā na bhavet /
SA11bsa047_u:206_0: saṃkṣepataḥ sarvasyaiva samādheḥ ṣaḍ doṣā bhavanti /
SA11bsa047_u:206_1: kausīdyam, ālambanasaṃpramoṣaḥ, layaḥ, auddhatyam, anābhogaḥ, ābhogaśceti / eṣāṃ pratipakṣeṇāṣṭau prahāṇasaṃskārā bhāvanīyāḥ /
SA11bsa047_u:206_2: śraddhā, chandaḥ, vyāyāmaḥ, prasrabdhiḥ, smṛtiḥ, saṃprajanyam, cetanā, upekṣā ceti / tatrādyāścatvāraḥ kausīdyapratipakṣāḥ /
SA11bsa047_u:206_3: tathā hi- samādhiguṇeṣvabhisaṃpratyayalakṣaṇayā śraddhayā yogino 'bhilāṣaḥ samutpadyate /
SA11bsa047_u:206_7: tataḥ [śraddhādayaḥ kausīdyaprahāṇāya bhavanti] tadartha te bhāvanīyāḥ /
SA11bsa047_u:206_11: layauddhatyāpraśamanakāle tu anābhogadoṣaḥ tatastatpratipakṣeṇa cetanā bhāvanīyā /
SA11bsa047_u:206_12: layauddhatyapraśame sati, yadā praśamabāhi cittaṃ bhavet,
SA11bsa047_u:206_15: tadā cittaṃ vikṣipyate / līne 'pi citte sati yadyābhogo na kriyate,
SA11bsa047_u:207_0: tato yāvadiccha yogī tāvad anabhisaṃskāreṇaiva tattvaṃ bhāvayaṃstiṣṭhet /
SA11bsa047_u:207_1: satyāṃ tu kāyādipīḍāyāṃ punaḥ punarantarā sakalameva lokaṃ vyavalokyamāyājala candropamapratibhāsaṃ [vata] avataret /
SA11bsa047_u:207_2: tatha coktam avikalpapraveśe- lokottareṇa jñānenākāśasamatalān sarvadharmānpaśyati /
SA11bsa047_u:207_6: evaṃvidhaṃ dharmagāmbhoryam anavagacchanto 'mī bālabuddhaya ādiśānteṣveva dharmeṣu bhāvādisamāropaviparyastā vividhakarmakleśān upacinvanti /
SA11bsa047_u:207_7: tataḥ saṃsāre paribhramanti, tato 'haṃ kariṣyāmi yathaitān evaṃvidhaṃ dharmāgāmbhīryam avabodhayeyam iti,
SA11bsa047_u:207_8: tato viśramya punarapi tathaiva sarvadharmanirābhāsaṃ samādhimavataret /
SA11bsa047_u:207_10: evam anena krameṇa ghaṭikām [arthapraharam] ekapraharaṃ vā yāvantaṃ kālaṃ śaknoti tāvantaṃ kālaṃ tiṣṭhet /
SA11bsa047_u:208_1: tata icchayā samādheḥ utthātuṃ paryaṅkam abhittvaivam anuvicintayet /
SA11bsa047_u:208_2: yadi nāmāmī dharmāḥ sarva eva paramārthato 'nutpannāstathāpi māyavat pratiniyatavividhahetupratyayasāmagrīvaśena vicitrā evāvicāraramaṇīyāḥ pravartante,
SA11bsa047_u:208_6: tatra ye prajñācakṣurvikalatayā viparyastamatayā ātmābhiniviṣṭā vividhāni karmāṇi kurvanti te saṃsāre paribhramanti /
SA11bsa047_u:208_7_0: ye punarekāntena saṃsāravimukhā mahākāruṇyavikalatayā ca na [sattvārthaṃ] dānādipāramitāḥ paripūrayanti ātmānaṃ damayanti
SA11bsa047_u:209_0_0: ye tu asvabhāvaṃ jagad avagamya mahākāruṇyabalena sakalajagadabhyuddharaṇakṛtaniścayā māyākāravad aviparyastadhiyo vipulapuṇyajñānasaṃbhāraṃ
SA11bsa047_u:209_0_1: samupāyanti te tathāgataṃ padaṃ prāpyāsaṃsāramaśeṣasya jagataḥ sarvākāraṃ hitasukhāni saṃpādayantaḥ tiṣṭhanti /
SA11bsa047_u:209_1: te ca jñāna[sambhāra]balena [samasta]kleśaprahāṇān na saṃsāre patanti sarvasattvāpekṣayā ca samupārjitavipulāprameyapuṇyasaṃbhāravaśena na nirvāṇe patanti,
SA11bsa047_u:209_6: tasmāt tarhi bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena puṇyasambhāre jñānasaṃbhāre ca sarvadābhiyogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ” iti /
SA11bsa047_u:209_7: āryatathāgatotpattisaṃbhasūtre coktam- “sa khalu punareṣa tathāgatānāṃ [Bhk_232] saṃbhavo naikena kāraṇena bhavati /
SA11bsa047_u:209_8: tat kasya hetoḥ? samudāgataistāvad bho jinaputrāprameyaśatasahasradaśakāraṇaistathāgatāḥ samudāgacchanti /
SA11bsa047_u:209_10: āryavimalakīrtinirdeśe coktam- “śatapuṇyanirjātāḥ sarvakuśaladharmanirjātā apramāṇakuśalamūlakarmanirjātāḥ kāyāstathāgatasyeti” vistaraḥ /
SA11bsa047_u:210_0: tad evaṃ kṛtvā śanaiḥ paryaṅkaṃ bhittvā daśadigvyavasthitān sarvabuddhabodhisattvān praṇipatya tebhyaśca pūjāstotropahāraṃ kṛtvāryabhadracaryādipraṇidhānaṃ pranidadhīta /
SA11bsa047_u:211_0: yastu manyate, cittavikalpasamutthāpitaśubhāśubhakarmavaśena sattvāḥ svargādikarma phalamanubhavantaḥ saṃsāre saṃsaranti /
SA11bsa047_u:211_1: ye punarna kiñciccintayanti nāpi kiñcit karma kurvanti te parimucyante saṃsārāt /
SA11bsa047_u:211_6: mahāyānamūlatvācca sarvayānānāṃ tatpratikṣepeṇa sarvam eva yānaṃ pratikṣiptaṃ syāt /
SA11bsa047_u:211_7: tathā hi 'na kiñciccintayitavyamiti' bruvata bhutapratyavekṣālakṣaṇā prajñā pratikṣiptā bhavet /
SA11bsa047_u:211_8: bhūtapratyavekṣā-mūlatvāt samyagjñānasya tatpratikṣepā llokottarāpi prajñā pratikṣiptā bhavet /
SA11bsa047_u:211_10: nāpi dānādicaryā kartavyeti vadatā copāyo dānādiḥ sphuṭatarameva pratikṣiptaḥ /
SA11bsa047_u:212_0: etāvad eva ca saṃkṣiptaṃ mahāyānaṃ yaduta prajñopāyaśca /
SA11bsa047_u:212_3: “ āryatathāgataguhyasūtre coktam- “imau ca prajñopāyau bodhisattvānāṃ sarvapāramitāsaṃgrahāya saṃvartete” iti /
SA11bsa047_u:212_4: tataśca mahāyānaṃ pratikṣipatā mahat karmāvaraṇaṃ kṛtaṃ syāt /
SA11bsa047_u:212_6: alpaśrutasya, ātmadṛṣṭiṃ parāmṛśataḥ,] asyānupāsitavidvajjanasyānavadhārita-tathāgata-pravacananīteḥ svayaṃ vinaṣṭasya parān api nāśayato yuktyāgamadūṣitatvāt,
SA11bsa047_u:212_7: viṣasaṃsṛṣṭavacanaṃ saviṣabhojanamiva ātmakāmena dhīmatā dūrata eva parihartavyam /
SA11bsa047_u:213_0: tathā hyanena bhūtapratyavekṣāṃ pratikṣipatā dharmapravicayākhyaṃ pradhānam eva bodhyaṅgaṃ pratikṣiptaṃ syāt /
SA11bsa047_u:213_1: vinā ca mūtapratyavekṣayā yoginaḥ katham anādikālābhyastarūpādibhāvābhiniveśasya cittaṃ nirvikalpatāṃ praviśet? sarvadharmeṣvasmṛtyamanasikāreṇa praviśatīti cet,
SA11bsa047_u:213_2: tad ayuktam / na hi vinā bhūtapratyavekṣayānubhūyamāneṣvapi sarvadharmeṣvasmṛtiramanasikāro vā śakyate kartum /
SA11bsa047_u:213_3: yadi ca nāmāmī dharmā mayāsmartavyā nāpi manasikartavyā ityevaṃ bhāvayannasmṛtimanasikārau teṣu bhāvayet tadā sutarām eva tena te smṛtā manasikṛtāśca syuḥ /
SA11bsa047_u:213_5: tadā tayorabhāvaḥ kena prakāreṇa bhavatīti etad eva vicāryate /
SA11bsa047_u:213_6: na cābhāvaḥ kāraṇaṃ yuktam, yena tato [nirnimittāmanasikārāt] nirvikalpatā bhavet /
SA11bsa047_u:213_8: na ca bhūtapratyavekṣāṃ vinānya upāyo 'sti yena prakāreṇāsmṛtyamanasikārau kuryāt /
SA11bsa047_u:214_1_0: vinā bhūtapratyavekṣayā niḥsvabhāvatā dharmāṇāṃ katham avagatā bhavet? na hi svabhāvata evaṃ dharmāḥ [Bhk_234] śūnyāḥ sthitā
SA11bsa047_u:214_2: nāpi vinā śūnyatāprativedhena āvaraṇaprahāṇaṃ saṃbhavati sarvatra sarveṣāṃ muktiprasaṅgāt /
SA11bsa047_u:214_3: kiṃ ca tasya yogino yadi sarvadharmeṣu muṣitasmṛtitayā mūḍhatayā vā smṛtimanasikārau na pravartete,
